page.title: 02General Information
page.content: is only 30 minutes by train. There are many features around the village such as the village hall and several clubs like cubs, scouts, brownies, and guides. There is a village carnival in the summer and after that there is a village fair with events such as a coconut shy, whippet racing and tombola. There are a few shops in the village for instance a newsagents, a post office, a small supermarket, a D.I.Y. shop and a hairdressers. There is a regular local bus service and the village has its own railway station.
